title: Wholesale Price of Oxen for Slaughter (Monthly Average) for Berlin, Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)-- Original Data, 1876-1897 (2)--Original Data, 1897-1916 (3)--Original Data, 1910-1915, 1921-1922, 1924-1936. Source: Vierteljahrshefte Zur Statistik Des Deutschen Reichs, 1893, I, P.38 And Later Issues.

This NBER data series m04117b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 4 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter04.html.

NBER Indicator: m04117b
